mapper.select: update INSBFlowinfo set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},currenthandle = #{currenthandle},flowcode = #{flowcode},flowname = #{flowname},overflowcode = #{overflowcode},overflowname = #{overflowname},firoredi = #{firoredi},islock = #{islock},pop1 = #{pop1},pop2 = #{pop2},taskstatus = #{taskstatus} where id = #{id}
